website_summaries.verdict: This white board and cork combo board is easy to hang, but be sure to factor in the cost of a better set of markers.
pros: 36 inch by 24 inch size board with half magnetic dry-erase white board and the other half cork
Has an aluminum frame with mounting hooks, making it easy to mount
Comes with a full-length pen tray, and a variety of accessories to get you started
cons: Because of the mounting hooks, you're stuck hanging this horizontally unless you want to modify it yourself
The included markers are of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Having read horror stories about dented and cracked boards on arrival, I was hopeful that my experience would be better...and it was! The board was well-packaged and arrived in perfect condition. Having read negative comments about the markers and eraser, it was a no-brainer to just order a separate package of pens/eraser/cleaning spray and eliminate that concern. Very happy with this whiteboard/corkboard combo!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A-plus!
customer_reviews.text: A terrific white and cork board! The first one arrived damaged, but the seller immediately made things right by sending out another one, which arrived in perfect shape. Happy child; happy mom!
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Actually Large Enough to Serve A Purpose
customer_reviews.text: This board is such a large size for a great price. It was super simple to mount and I can not believe that everything was included. I hung it over my computer desk and it has really helped me stay organized. It is the best deal on a combo board by a long shot. If you are looking to get more organized, buy this!
customer_reviews.author: JTaub

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This board is awesome! The cork is way thicker than the ones on similar boards you can get at stores like Staples, and a lot cheaper. I’ve had this board for a couple of months and absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Faria

customer_reviews.title: A most practical board!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. The ledge to hold the marker &the eraser is the reason I purchased this particular one, otherwise where do you keep the pieces? Great product. Delivered on time. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J,M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It was the answer to the organization I was hoping to achieve for my family. This has turned into "command central." Great versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Came With Everything I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a product to help me track and schedule my progress in building my small business. This product came with the markers, erasers, little tags and tacks. It was bundled beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jeuel Howard

customer_reviews.title: Best White Board Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very good and functional. Marker wipes right off after weeks of being on there. the board is very sturdy but light. Easy to hang and use. Comes with lots of free items to use! I am actually ordering a second one to use next to my first one because it is so functional! Would recommend​ to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Hassen H

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the cork board came with a crack in the upper corner and the white board had a very fine crack too but it still works so I’m okay with it :) the magnets are cute
customer_reviews.author: ajmaisano

customer_reviews.title: Optimal size and great design
customer_reviews.text: Great size; strong magnets, markers, and an eraser are included (eraser is magnetic and is stored on the whiteboard itself). It's perfect for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition, terrible instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect condition. The markers that came with it were not good, but I had read previous reviews and bought magnetic ones that work great. However, the mounting instructions were useless. I shared a pic of them so others would be prepared. I've hung many things on my walls, so I didn't have too much trouble, but if this were my first time there would have been a problem! The instructions and markers are why it got four stars instead of five (I would've given it 3.5 if I could've).
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Comes with an assortment of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Quality bulletin board, although I was baffled at first by the protective plastic film over the magnetic dry erase portion of the board. No instructions as to how to remove it. I communicated with the company and they were very prompt and efficient in answering my concerns. I wish that had been addressed in their instructions. But I do like the board. It comes with lots of supplies--eraser, push pins, magnets, etc. Very well designed and packaged.
customer_reviews.author: GLT

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good board size for the money but we had some issues. Installation was hard given the instructions and tools provided. My husband installed and he’s very handy but he got a little frustrated. The outer metal frame was a bit filmsy and not as sturdy as I hoped. When writing on the white board you have to spray really good and put some elbow grease into removing the marker. It’s ok but I wouldn’t purchase again and definitely don’t recommend if your needs are great.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: Mounting instructions leave something to desire, there is a lack of specific requirements. An example is nothing on the size of drill required to properly use the included anchor. Also the distance between mounting hooks would be very useful. Everything else was as described and it appears the board will meet all our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great size and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great size and well made. I would suggest buying your own markers though, as the ones it comes with don’t write well.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B.

customer_reviews.title: Weak cork on board
customer_reviews.text: A couple months in and the cork on the board can barely hold a couple photos and papers and the markers for the board are dried out. I wake up every morning to items that fell off the board with the pin because the cork can’t handle its weight.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy and large enough to be quite useful. My one complaint is that all of the markers included with the board were either dry or light enough as to not be visible from a few feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Flurries

customer_reviews.title: Good value looks professional
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my home office Easy to install It seems sturdy and I would consider buying another for my son
customer_reviews.author: Niall Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Love it for her to do board in the kitchen works good for my family
customer_reviews.text: Love it for her to do board in the kitchen works good for my family
customer_reviews.author: Ally z

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the board. I use it everyday. It has stayed in tack on the wall for the entire 8 months that I have it. Comes with everything that you need. Great product to have to organize your life.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this white board. Not worth the money. The white board doesn’t clean very easy and it’s cheaply made. Plus you can’t even return because it’s hazardous material from what Amazon said.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creating a vision board

customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the great quality of this product for the price I paid. It is sturdy and sharp looking. I would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: A tad flimsy but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is a little light and flimsy. The dry erase markers and eraser are a little on the cheap side but it's doing it's job so far.

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate for work or home!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing absolutely love it !!!!!! Wish the markers worked a little better but aside from that totally recommended !!!! Love it for my vision board

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my office. I like all the accessories that came with it. Love the split cork and write on split. So much room to have reminders notes and inspirations in the board.

customer_reviews.title: Marker doesn’t wipe off
customer_reviews.text: Although this looks perfect and the cork board and magnetic feature work well, if you write a message on the marker board and leave it longer than a few minutes, it will not wipe off! Very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: White board very poor

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!

customer_reviews.title: Good board but poor quality markers/eraser
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for what I wanted. I love being able to use the cork board and magnets for holding papers. The white board would be great, but the markers they send are not great quality and didn’t fully erase and stained the board. The eraser also is not high quality, either. There are scratches now on the board from it. Overall, a great board but I’d not use the things sent with it next time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

product_meta.title: 36 x 24 White Board and Cork Board Combination, Magnetic Bulletin Combo Board for Home or Office, Use as Vision or Message Board, Wall Mounted Memo Board, Dry Erase Markers, Eraser, Magnets, Push Pins
feature_bullets: LOOKING FOR A PREMIUM MAGNETIC DRY ERASE BOARD and CORK BOARD? — The left side of this versatile notice board has an anti-scratch coating perfect for any dry-erase marker. Writing is clean and smooth and cleanup is a breeze. Not only is it great for jotting down thoughts and messages, its magnetized surface means you can keep track of important documents and notes.

GREAT FOR HOME - OFFICE - CLASSROOM - COLLEGE DORM — This combination board is perfect for any home office to stay organized and keep things in place. The pinboard is made of self-healing cork which is designed to handle countless thumbtacks, sticky tack, sticky notes, and pins. Be creative and use as a memo, notice board, calendar or vision board by adding pictures and goals for inspiration.
TOUGH ALUMINUM FRAME and MOUNTING HOOKS — The Besso white board/cork board has a durable aluminum frame made to last with durable mounting hooks that allows for easy hanging on the wall.

PEN TRAY and FREE ACCESSORIES — The attached full-length aluminum pen tray means your dry-erasers are always there when you need them. This combination whiteboard/bulletin board comes with everything you need to keep your ideas or business organized: 2 colored dry-erase markers, a dry eraser, 4 magnets, and a set of thumbtacks / push pins.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE — The large Besso half white / cork board is backed by a lifetime guarantee. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please let us know and we will happily refund you the order. The tack board combo can be used as an office cork board, big note board, and a large magnetic erase board combo. It is a great white board for kids, adults, and teens that need a large planner to organize their lives.
